java/liquibase/database/sql/AddUniqueConstraintStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00007 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00008 
00009 public class AddUniqueConstraintStatement implements SqlStatement {
00010 
00011     private String schemaName;
00012     private String tableName;
00013     private String columnNames;
00014     private String constraintName;
00015     private String tablespace;
00016 
00017     public AddUniqueConstraintStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnNames, String constraintName) {
00018         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00019         this.tableName = tableName;
00020         this.columnNames = columnNames;
00021         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getSchemaName() {
00025         return schemaName;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getTableName() {
00029         return tableName;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getColumnNames() {
00033         return columnNames;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getConstraintName() {
00037         return constraintName;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getTablespace() {
00041         return tablespace;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public AddUniqueConstraintStatement setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00045         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00046         return this;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00050         String sql = "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ADD CONSTRAINT " + getConstraintName() + " UNIQUE (" + getColumnNames() + ")";
00051 
00052         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getTablespace()) != null && database.supportsTablespaces()) {
00053             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00054                 sql += " ON " + getTablespace();
00055             } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00056                 ; //not supported in DB2
00057             } else {
00058                 sql += " USING INDEX TABLESPACE " + getTablespace();
00059             }
00060         }
00061 
00062         return sql;
00063     }
00064 
00065     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00066         return ";";
00067     }
00068 
00069     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00070         return true;
00071     }
00072 }
